name: Dual Combat Alpha Test #5
description:
NOTE FOR CHROME USERS:

We have received reports of poor framerate when using Google Chrome to play the game. If this happens to you, we strongly recommend using Microsoft Edge for the smoothest playing experience. We will continue to investigate the issues with Chrome.

Thank you for participating in the Dual Combat Alpha Test #5!

We strongly encourage you to fill out our brief playtest survey to give us your feedback. Your thoughts are important to us and will help us to make the best game we can. 

From November 7th through November 21st, we will also be raffling off a Prize Giveaway for all participants! All participants will be entered in a raffle to win their choice of $10 Steam Credit or 2 Months of Game Pass Ultimate. All you have to do is play the demo, complete our playtest survey, and agree to the terms and conditions specified in the survey to be entered in the contest.

For more information regarding giveaways and future updates, hop on into our Discord to keep up with the latest with Dual Combat!

-------------------------------------------------------------------

Dual Combat is a puzzle-action game about duality. The goal of the game is simple: you (the blue soldier) must shoot the enemy (the red soldier) and survive long enough to be the last man standing.

This is no ordinary combat, though - you control both the player and the enemy! The enemy will mirror your every move, including running, shooting, and everything in between.

No action goes without repercussions from the enemy side, so the player will have to be thoughtful and quick with every move they take. You'll have to learn to play both sides of the battlefield if you plan on emerging victorious!
